'''Ivan A. Derzhanski''' (born [[15 May]] [[1967]]) is a Bulgarian mathematician and linguist. Since [[1999]], he is a member of the Review Panel of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.math.bas.bg/~iad/biograf.html|articlename=Ivan A Derzhanski’s Curriculum Vitæ|dated=|website=[http://www.math.bas.bg/~iad/ Ivan A Derzhanski's Home Page]|accessed=9 April 2012}}</ref>
